text: Can you help me find some possible illnesses that cause a rash?
Sure, let me search for that.

output.name: SymptomSearch
output.description: This API searches for a given symptom.

results.description: The list of results. Format be like [{"name":possible disease name, "description": disease details},...]

output.name: Contact dermatitis
output.description: A type of rash that occurs when the skin comes into contact with an irritant or allergen.

output.name: Eczema
output.description: A chronic skin condition that can cause dry, itchy patches of skin.

text: Here are some possible illnesses that cause a rash: Contact dermatitis - a type of rash that occurs when the skin comes into contact with an irritant or allergen. Eczema - a chronic skin condition that can cause dry, itchy patches of skin. Do you need more information on any of these?
